__e: I want our baby to know my family.
It's just nobody can believe that I know my own mind.
I don't need your girl knowing' mine.
It's not easy to say, but... I want you to know the truth.
No, uh, it's just, um, I think it's time you knew the truth.
You know my life. You don't think I know yours?
Well, I can't wait till you meet my eldest son.
And I cannot wait for you to meet my good friend... this guy.
Hell, I just want people to know my name.
Maybe he's decided it's time for the world to know his name.
But I wouldn't be so sure there's a God who knows why.
He's making the whole world understand his pain now, isn't he?
You didn't want me at the party, and you obviously don't want me at this play, or meeting your friends.
Is that why you don't want me - to meet your friends?
He knows more of my secrets than he does yours.
Oh, no, we just... want her to know all the facts.
Is it possible you don't know them all as well as you think?
Okay, it's probably time that you met everyone face-to-face.
I know you better than you know yourself.
Like you said, I know you better than you know yourself.
He has told me so much about you that I know you better than yourself.
I know you better than you know yourself, but not well enough.
He has told me so much about you that I know you better than yourself.
In fact, you don't know how well he knows you.
[laughing] Unless you know some other way.
I think it's only fair if I get to know you a little better.
I guess, like, he might have taken a picture with you at some point?
